claim.text: FuseMix and CLIP are both highly competitive and sometimes able to outperform state-of-the-art methods which are trained on orders of magnitude more paired data and that require substantially more than a single GPU of compute for fusion.
claim.exact_quote: we highlight that our method is highly competitive and sometimes able to outperform various state-of-the-art methods which are trained on orders of magnitude more paired data and that require substantially more than a single GPU of compute for fusion.

evidence.evidence_text: FuseMix and CLIP are both highly competitive and sometimes able to outperform state-of-the-art methods which are trained on orders of magnitude more paired data and that require substantially more than a single GPU of compute for fusion.
evidence.exact_quote: we highlight that our method is highly competitive and sometimes able to outperform various state-of-the-art methods which are trained on orders of magnitude more paired data and that require substantially more than a single GPU of compute for fusion.

claim.text: FuseMix is an effective strategy for fusion on lower data regimes.
claim.exact_quote: We also note that when our method and CLIP are both only trained on pairs from Conceptual Captions 3M, we outperform CLIP by a notable margin, demonstrating that FuseMix is an effective strategy for fusion on lower data regimes.

evidence.evidence_text: FuseMix is an effective strategy for fusion on lower data regimes.
evidence.exact_quote: We also note that when our method and CLIP are both only trained on pairs from Conceptual Captions 3M, we outperform CLIP by a notable margin, demonstrating that FuseMix is an effective strategy for fusion on lower data regimes.

claim.text: Models trained with FuseMix outperform all other methods trained on similar data.
claim.exact_quote: Similarly, for audio-text retrieval we outperform all other methods trained on similar data.

evidence.evidence_text: Models trained with FuseMix outperform all other methods trained on similar data.
evidence.exact_quote: Similarly, for audio-text retrieval we outperform all other methods trained on similar data.

claim.text: FuseMix can compete with methods that use orders of magnitude more paired data.
claim.exact_quote: and can compete with methods that use orders of magnitude more paired data.

evidence.evidence_text: FuseMix can compete with methods that use orders of magnitude more paired data.
evidence.exact_quote: and can compete with methods that use orders of magnitude more paired data.

claim.text: The quality of the underlying dataset has a very strong effect on downstream performance.
claim.exact_quote: ...the quality of the underlying dataset also has a very strong effect, as has been similarly observed in other work.

evidence.evidence_text: The quality of the underlying dataset has a very strong effect on downstream performance.
evidence.exact_quote: ...the quality of the underlying dataset also has a very strong effect, as has been similarly observed in other work.

claim.text: Sourcing image-text pairs that are maximally diverse provides substantial improvements in downstream performance.
claim.exact_quote: In Figure 3c we find that with access to limited data, sourcing image-text pairs that are maximally diverse provides substantial improvements of up to nearly 40% compared to se

evidence.evidence_text: Sourcing image-text pairs that are maximally diverse provides substantial improvements in downstream performance.
evidence.exact_quote: In Figure 3c we find that with access to limited data, sourcing image-text pairs that are maximally diverse provides substantial improvements of up to nearly 40% compared to se

claim.text: FuseMix can be used to repurpose an existing text-to-image generative model to be conditioned on audio in lieu of text.
claim.exact_quote: ...we consider the recently proposed task of generating images given audio prompts. The aim is to repurpose an existing text-to-image generative model to be conditioned on audio in lieu of text.

evidence.evidence_text: FuseMix can be used to repurpose an existing text-to-image generative model to be conditioned on audio in lieu of text.
evidence.exact_quote: ...we consider the recently proposed task of generating images given audio prompts. The aim is to repurpose an existing text-to-image generative model to be conditioned on audio in lieu of text.

claim.text: FuseMix can provide substantial benefits in scarce data regimes.
claim.exact_quote: ...we leverage more readily available unimodal signals.

evidence.evidence_text: FuseMix can provide substantial benefits in scarce data regimes.
evidence.exact_quote: ...we leverage more readily available unimodal signals.
